articles.description: Impressed by her performance in the upcoming Uppena her charming beauty, Chiranjeevi predicted that she would turn busy after the release of her debut movie.
articles.content:
“Sign her up now. Or you will have to pay more later. I am telling you, she is going to be a rage,” megastar Chiranjeevi asked the Telugu producers to sign Krithi Shetty for their movies.
